title: Necromancer
summaries: The Necromancer is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy enemy that spawns in the Dungeon after Plantera is defeated. Necromancers attack by rapidly firing Shadow Beams at the player, thin rays of purple light that reflect off walls multiple times. They travel at an extremely high velocity, being fired nearly instantly, and inflict the Slow debuff. Necromancers teleport to a different location on-screen after firing projectiles six times or when being hit.
Necromancers are most common in Dungeon areas with <linked>Brick Walls</linked>, as indicated by the <linked>Necromantic Signs</linked> present within these sections.
